entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
